00108 
00109 void Schema_Backward_Differentiation_order_3::compute_backward_differentiation_coefficients(double time_step, const DoubleTab& times) const
00110 {
00111   assert(times.size_array() == 4); //past, present and future times, stored in ascending order inside "times" table
00112 
00113   if (backward_differentiation_coefficients_.size_array() != 4)
00114     {
00115       backward_differentiation_coefficients_.resize(4,Array_base::NOCOPY_NOINIT);
00116     }
00117 
00118   double alpha_1 = 1.;                            //!< for times[2] which means present time
00119   double alpha_2 = time_step/(times[3]-times[1]); //!< for times[1] which means past time that is to say t(n-1)
00120   double alpha_3 = time_step/(times[3]-times[0]); //!< for times[0] which means past past time that is to say t(n-2)
00121 
00122   backward_differentiation_coefficients_[3] = 1./(alpha_1+alpha_2+alpha_3);                                                                  //for times[3] which means future time
00123   backward_differentiation_coefficients_[2] = alpha_1*backward_differentiation_coefficients_[3]/((1.-alpha_2/alpha_1)*(1.-alpha_3/alpha_1)); //for times[2] which means past time
00124   backward_differentiation_coefficients_[1] = alpha_2*backward_differentiation_coefficients_[3]/((1.-alpha_1/alpha_2)*(1.-alpha_3/alpha_2)); //for times[1] which means past time
00125   backward_differentiation_coefficients_[0] = alpha_3*backward_differentiation_coefficients_[3]/((1.-alpha_1/alpha_3)*(1.-alpha_2/alpha_3)); //for times[0] which means past past time
00126 }
